授業目的: 個体物理学に欠かせない、古典、量子、統計力学の理解とそれらの個体物理学への応用力の習得。
到達目標: 受講生が、本講の主役となる調和振動子の古典・量子力学的かつ統計力学的な意味の理解できること。
授業の概要・背景:
The course will basically follow the as described in the following "Session" using power point.
Requests to have other topics/subjects relevant to physics such as more formal quantum mechanics based on bar-ket and commutation, are welcome. The lecturer is willing to improvise and respond to the demand.
